title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 403.1 - Challenge of cleanup and removal costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 403.1 - Challenge of cleanup and removal costs

State Regulations
A person challenging claims for cleanup and removal costs
presented to the fund for payment must file a written notice with the
administrator no later than seven calendar days after such claim for payment is
received by the administrator. Such notice shall state the particular items
being challenged and the basis for the challenge. Notes

403.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
